title: Looking To Mentor/Coach Lower Elo Players/Teams
body:
Hey guys, this really only applies to silver/bronze players (i'm more then willing to help others i'm just new to this)

I've been looking to coach soloq players who have been looking for advice or have been struggling in anyway. I can work with any lane and any role that you would provide me.

If you have any questions feel free to post a comment or add me in game, i'm on majority of hours during the day. 
Djent,
(My elo is Gold 2)

replies.body: Do you by any chance have an NA account?
I could always make an account.
